pkgmetadata.longdescription: 3D Rendering Using Obliquely Projected Cubes and Cuboids // Three-dimensional rendering for 'grid' and 'ggplot2' graphics using cubes and cuboids drawn with an oblique projection. As a special case also supports primary view orthographic projections. Can be viewed as an extension to the 'isocubes' package https://github.com/coolbutuseless/isocubes.
